New Records: J.P. Crawford set a new MLB record with Seattle's 113th hit-by-pitch of the season
Key Match Events: Leody Taveras hit a walk-off home run in the ninth inning
Marcus Semien delivered the winning run on a single
Texas broke through against Bryan Woo in the sixth inning with three straight one-out singles
Pre-Game Insights: The Mariners felt like they were on top of the hill entering the bottom of the sixth
Manager Dan Wilson emphasized the importance of resilience and bouncing back from challenges
Post-Match Reflections: Cal Raleigh expressed the team's determination to move on from the tough loss and keep their playoff hopes alive
Manager Dan Wilson noted the team's ability to face challenges and bounce back
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mariners missed a golden opportunity to make up ground in the AL Wild Card race
The team is now one game behind the Twins and two games back of a playoff spot behind Kansas City and Detroit
